source.sqlReaderQuery:
Truncate table dbo.customers
select 1 as dummy

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select max(LastModifyTime) as NewWatermark from emp_source

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCSTGEMP1
SRCSTGEMP1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		SALARY,
		MANAGER_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Name = concat(FIRST_NAME,concat(' ',LAST_NAME))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['derived.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Emp_ID as integer,
		Product_ID as string,
		Sale_Date as date,
		Quantity as integer,
		Sales_Amount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Factsource
source(output(
		Seqkey as integer,
		EMP_ID as integer,
		EName as string,
		Designation as string,
		WorkLocation as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimensionTable
Factsource, Select1 lookup(Emp_ID == D_EMP_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Seqkey,
		D_EMP_ID = EMP_ID,
		D_EName = EName,
		D_Designation = Designation,
		D_WorkLocation = WorkLocation,
		D_isActive = isActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DimensionTable filter(isActive == 1) ~> Filter1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		Emp_ID,
		Product_ID,
		Sale_Date,
		Quantity,
		Sales_Amount,
		Seqkey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 split(not(isNull(Seqkey)),
	isNull(Seqkey),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ExistingEmp, NotExisint)
ConditionalSplit1@ExistingEmp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Seqkey as integer,
		EMP_ID as integer,
		ProductId as string,
		Saledate as date,
		Quantity as integer,
		Sales_Amount as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Seqkey,
		EMP_ID = Emp_ID,
		ProductId = Product_ID,
		Saledate = Sale_Date,
		Quantity,
		Sales_Amount
	)) ~> TargetFact
ConditionalSplit1@NotExisint sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Customer_Id as string,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Customer Country} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Failedrecords.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Orders
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactName as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
Orders, Customers join(Orders@CustomerID == Customers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{198} as string,
		Donald as string,
		OConnell as string,
		DOCONNEL as string,
		{650.507.9833} as string,
		{21-JUN-07} as string,
		SH_CLERK as string,
		{2600} as string,
		{ - } as string,
		{124} as string,
		{50} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Innerjoin.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InnerJoin

source(output(
		Customer_Id as integer,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Customer Country} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		cust_id as integer,
		cust_name as string,
		cust_country as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['cust_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		cust_id = Customer_Id,
		cust_name = {Customer Name},
		cust_country = {Customer Country}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Customer_Id as integer,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Customer Country} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		cust_id as integer,
		cust_name as string,
		cust_country as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['cust_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		cust_id = Customer_Id,
		cust_name = {Customer Name},
		cust_country = {Customer Country}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactName as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		cust_id as integer,
		cust_name as string,
		cust_country as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		cust_id = CustomerID
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCSTGEMP1
SRCSTGEMP1 filter(EMPLOYEE_ID > 200) ~> Filter1
SRCSTGEMP1 filter(EMPLOYEE_ID < 200) ~> Filter2
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EMPlessthan200.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EMPlgreaterthan200.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{sale date} as string,
		saleitem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> errorhandlesoucesalesind
errorhandlesoucesalesind split(isNull(
    toDate({sale date}, 'dd-mm-yyyy')
    ),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(errorrow, goodrows)
ConditionalSplit1@errorrow derive(sourcefilename = 'salesindia2022.csv') ~> sourcefilenameforerrorrow
ConditionalSplit1@goodrows derive(sourcefilename = 'salesindia2022.csv',
		{sale date} = toDate
(
    {sale date},
    'dd-MM-yyyy'),
		quantity = toInteger(quantity)) ~> sourcefilenameforgoodrows
sourcefilenameforerrorrow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		saledate as string,
		saleitem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		saledate = {sale date},
		saleitem,
		country,
		quantity
	)) ~> sinksalesind
sourcefilenameforgoodrows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		saledate as timestamp,
		saleitem as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer,
		sourcefilename as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		saledate = {sale date},
		saleitem,
		country,
		quantity,
		sourcefilename
	)) ~> sinkforgoodrows

source(output(
		{Customer Id} as integer,
		{Customer Name} as string,
		{Customer Country} as string,
		{Phone Number} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Sourcefilecsv
source(output(
		Seqkey as integer,
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_Country as string,
		Phone_Number as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Targettable
Sourcefilecsv derive(isActive = 1) ~> addingisActive
addingisActive select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Id},
		{Customer Name},
		{Customer Country},
		{Phone Number},
		isActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Targettable select(mapColumn(
		T_Seqkey = Seqkey,
		T_Customer_Id = Customer_Id,
		T_Customer_Name = Customer_Name,
		T_Customer_Country = Customer_Country,
		T_Phone_Number = Phone_Number,
		T_isActive = isActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Sourcefilecsv, Select2 lookup({Customer Id} == T_Customer_Id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(T_Customer_Id)) ~> Existingrecords
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Existingrecords select(mapColumn(
		T_Seqkey,
		T_Customer_Id,
		T_Customer_Name,
		T_Customer_Country,
		T_Phone_Number,
		T_isActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(T_isActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Seqkey as integer,
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_Country as string,
		Phone_Number as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Customer_Id = {Customer Id},
		Customer_Name = {Customer Name},
		Customer_Country = {Customer Country},
		Phone_Number = {Phone Number},
		isActive
	)) ~> InsertNew
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Seqkey as integer,
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_Country as string,
		Phone_Number as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Seqkey'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Seqkey = T_Seqkey,
		Customer_Id = T_Customer_Id,
		Customer_Name = T_Customer_Name,
		Customer_Country = T_Customer_Country,
		Phone_Number = T_Phone_Number,
		isActive = T_isActive
	)) ~> UpdateExisting
